title: Detect Creatures
data:
{{Obsolete}}

'''Detect Creatures''' was a level 2 [[Divinations]] spell which allowed you to see monsters located beyond your field of vision within a certain radius. It wasn't entirely accurate, however; positions could be off by a tile, and it would only display the type of monster, not the specific monster ([[Sigmund]] would be displayed as a [[human (monster)|human]], an [[anaconda]] would be displayed as a snake, etc.). The spell would also reveal [[mimic]]s.

It was formerly found in the following [[spellbook]]s:
*[[Book of Wizardry]]
*[[Book of Divinations]]
*[[Monster Manual]]

==History==
Detect Creatures was removed in [[0.6]] with the removal of the Divinations school of magic.
